events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to wrong item received by the customer.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle the customer's case promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry for the inconvenience caused by receiving the wrong item. I'll be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify and process the refund quickly?
I've attached a photo of the wrong item that arrived and included my order number in the message.
Thank you for the information. We have confirmed the issue and will initiate your refund right away. You should see the amount refunded in 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and your assistance. I appreciate the fast refund process.
Weâ€™re glad we could resolve your issue. Your refund has been processed and should appear on your statement shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with our service. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
This case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support, and we hope to serve you better in the future.
We have sent you a brief survey to gather feedback on your experience with the refund process. Your input is highly valued.
